subject: Re: Quote Request for 3 Items
body:
Thank you for your inquiry. We appreciate your interest in Acme Corp products.

We have received your inquiry about the following products: Widget Pro, Premium Widget, Bulk Pack.

We have all the necessary information to prepare your quote.

We will provide your quote within 24 hours. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us at sales@acme.com.
questions: Do you have any specific delivery requirements or timeline preferences?
closing:
Best regards,

Acme Corp Sales Team
sales@acme.com
